title: Nine new Cabinet Ministers appointed
body_lines: Nine new Cabinet ministers have been sworn in before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today.
Accordingly, Nimal Siripala De Silva was sworn in as Ports, Naval and Aviation Services Minister while Susil Premajayantha as Minister of Education, Keheliya Rambukwella as Minister of Health.

Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was appointed as Justice, Prison Affairs, Constitutional Reforms Minister, Harin Fernando was appointed Minister of Tourism and Land, Ramesh Pathirana appointed as Plantation Industries Minister, Manusha Nanayakkara Minister of Labour and Foreign Employment, Nalin Fernando appointed as Minister of Trade, Commerce, and Food Security and Tiran Alles was appointed as Public Security Minister.
